snippet.title: 8Doors: Arum's Afterlife Adventure - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
"8Doors: Arum's Afterlife Adventure" is finally coming to Steam and GOG on April 4th!
Brace yourself to venture through the mystic lands of Korean purgatory in this story-driven Metroidvania.

“8Doors: Arum’s Afterlife Adventure” is a story-driven Metroidvania style 2D action platformer heavily influenced by Korean folk tales of the afterlife. Play as ‘Arum’, a brave girl that has voluntarily entered the realm of the afterlife in search of her father’s soul and adventure through the 8 doors of purgatory and solve mysteries that lie deep within the realm of the afterlife. Defeat wretched wraiths blocking your way and rescue fugitive souls who need your guidance. 

On Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/668550/8Doors_Arums_Afterlife_Adventure/
On GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/8doors_arums_afterlife_adventure
